forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 48. West northwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Washington's Birthday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 5 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a canvas of muted clouds, casting a gentle veil over the cityscape. With night’s lingering chill still in the air, temperatures hover around a cool 48 degrees, brushed by a calm west-northwest breeze that whispers through the streets. As daybreak approaches, one can expect a shift; the clouds may part to reveal hints of sunshine, elevating the temperature to a more inviting 57 degrees by mid-afternoon.

The horizon towards the Golden Gate Bridge might be softened with a hint of the marine layer, subtly cloaking the iconic vista in a shroud of gray, while the city itself remains somewhat clear, allowing its vibrant life to breathe softly beneath the morning gloom. Dressing in layers provides the smartest approach—an adaptable jacket allows one to greet the day’s gentle descent into warmth while keeping the chill at bay. 

This quiet winter day, adorned with the promise of sun peeking through the clouds, invites a contemplative stroll along the Embarcadero or a leisurely visit to a cozy café. One might lean into the tranquil atmosphere, savoring a warm drink while watching the pulse of the city awaken gradually. Engage in the simple pleasures today offers, as urban life melds with the serenity of the winter sky.
